data.title: Fablehaven: Rise of the Evening Star by Brandon Mull, Paperback
data.meta_description: Used copy of Fablehaven: Rise of the Evening Star by Brandon Mull for sale on Pangobooks.
data.text: ï¿¼Book 2 in the New York Times bestselling Fablehaven series. Rated 4.2 out of 5 on Goodreads The second book in this thrilling, bestselling series finds Kendra and her brother, Seth, returning to Fablehaven, a refuge for mythical and magical creatures, where their grandfather is the caretaker. As they work to keep a hidden artifact of great power from falling into the wrong hands, you will find yourself on the edge of your seat and lost in the adventure and fantasy that is Fablehaven. Grade level: 4 - 9
